thread.title: Weekend Break in a Good Wheelchair Accessible Room
thread.title_full: Weekend Break in a Good Wheelchair Accessible Room - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: CraftyCath
title: Weekend Break in a Good Wheelchair Accessible Room
text: We stayed for three nights over a long weekend. The accessible room was a little small, but otherwise very well equipped and suitable for someone in a wheelchair. The staff were friendly and obliging in all areas, but particularly on arrival, when we were shown to our room to check its suitability. They even offered to remove the castors on the bed to make it that bit lower so that transfers from the wheelchair were easier. This is a first in our experience, and is to be commended. We only had breakfast in the hotel (in the executive lounge) which had a good fresh selection and was of good quality.
